meanings.sent1: The unexploded bomb lay silently in the field.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers carefully marked the unexploded mines in the area.
meanings.sent3: The unexploded firework refused to light up the night sky.
meanings.sent4: Her unexploded anger simmered just beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The unexploded gas leak posed a serious threat to the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: Remaining in a state of potential explosion
meanings.sent1: The unexploded gas cylinder was a danger to the entire building.
meanings.sent2: The unexploded fireworks were stored in a secure location.
meanings.sent3: The unexploded party popper surprised everyone when it finally went off.
meanings.sent4: His unexploded excitement for the trip made him restless.
meanings.sent5: The unexploded tension in the room was palpable.
